snippet: Precisely how much money it takes to gain access is up for debate, but even politicians themselves have admitted that big donors get special treatment.
abstract: Academic research confirms belief long held by many voters that campaign donations provide access to politicians; while specific outcomes are difficult to measure, even politicians admit that big money donors get special treatment.
lead_paragraph: Precisely how much money it takes to gain access is up for debate, but even politicians themselves have admitted that big donors get special treatment.

headline.main: A Citizen’s Guide to Buying Political Access
headline.print_headline: A Citizen’s Guide to Buying Political Access
